createenvironment.name: CreateEnvironment
createenvironment.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon EVS environment

createenvironmenthost.name: CreateEnvironmentHost
createenvironmenthost.description: Grants permission to add host to an Amazon EVS environment

deleteenvironment.name: DeleteEnvironment
deleteenvironment.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon EVS environment

deleteenvironmenthost.name: DeleteEnvironmentHost
deleteenvironmenthost.description: Grants permission to delete a host from an Amazon EVS environment

getenvironment.name: GetEnvironment
getenvironment.description: Grants permission to get an Amazon EVS environment

listenvironmenthosts.name: ListEnvironmentHosts
listenvironmenthosts.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of hosts associated with an Amazon EVS environment

listenvironmentvlans.name: ListEnvironmentVlans
listenvironmentvlans.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of Amazon EVS environment VLANs

listenvironments.name: ListEnvironments
listenvironments.description: Grants permission to retrieve a list of Amazon EVS environments in an account

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list the tags on a specified resource ARN

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to tag a specified resource ARN

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a specified resource ARN
